item.title: CVE-2023-36816|2023-07-03T16:12:17.141Z -- bubka -- 2fauth
item.description: 2FA is a Web app to manage Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) accounts and generate their security codes. Cross site scripting (XSS) injection can be done via the account/service field. This was tested in docker-compose environment. This vulnerability has been patched in version 4.0.3.
